= Introduction =

Today I found ActiveX for Chrome works on Wine Chrome.
However, [http://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=27248 Bug 27248] and [http://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=21232 Bug 21232] should be fixed first.

Bug 21232 - Chrome can't load any webpage unless --no-sandbox is used
Bug 27248 - cannot unpack *.crx (extensions or themes) in Chrome
